edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp
Class ProgramFileProperties

java.lang.Object
  edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.ProgramProperties
      edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.ProgramFileProperties

public class ProgramFileProperties
extends ProgramProperties

Manages a properties file used by the application using a java.util.Properties object. This class does not throw exceptions if unable to access the underlying file system but rather simply returns null for a property on any error.

Author:
chet.rebman
